content: for pattern support please go to the questions thread here 1 this sweater is a great beginner project to take the first step into susiem s contiguous set-in sleeves 2 method plain stockinette raw edges and big stripes makes a perfect ***on the beach*** sweater hope you enjoy **now available in polish ** **now available in french thank you madlaineyarn person ** in the first line of the pattern the marker set up the number of stitches for the back was missing - we corrected this and updated the french version **now available in dutch thank you corine 3 ** **now available in portuguese thank you beatriz 4 ** **now available in italian thank you natascia 5 ** **please note the following correction of the italian version** page 2 **ferro 1 dl ** dir fino al primo mp aidx pm 2dir pm aisx dir fino al mp pm a1sx dir fino al mp a1dx pm dir fino al mp a1dx pm 2 dir pm a1sx 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/designs-by-isabell-kraemer/3288437/1-25 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/contiguous 3 http //www ravelry com/people/bloemendalwol 4 http //www ravelry com/people/bmedina 5 http //www ravelry com/people/natasciasartini
